title: NVIDIA launches new RTX GPUs for creators along with Omniverse Cloud
content:
Today, NVIDIA kicked off its GPU Technology Conference, or GTC, and with it come a few big announcements for creative professionals. On the hardware side, the company is launching a new NVIDIA RTX A5500 GPU for the desktop, along with a full range of laptop GPUs to power new professional laptops for creators. On the

The post NVIDIA launches new RTX GPUs for creators along with Omniverse Cloud appeared first on xda-developers.
description: NViDIA has launched a slew of new RTX laptop GPUs for creators, plus a new model for desktop. It also announced Omniverse Cloud.
